text:

author: sevenA
text: Just watched #PaatalLok It is raw, it is complex, it is gripping, and it is a fantastic entertainer!!! @PrimeVideoIN I am short of words to describe the show's pure excellence and especially @Jaiahlawat's LEGENDARY performance. He's a bigg⭐!

author: sevenA
text: Watched #Kaamyaab last night.... What a heartfelt slice of life of character actors! @imsanjaimishra delivers one of his best perfomances. Kudos to the entire team... @iamsrk @NetflixIndia @RedChilliesEnt #KaamyaabOnNetflix

author: sevenA
text:
One thing is for sure... 
When all this is over, people will cherish and respect their work lives a lot more. 

Because, we have discovered that sitting idle at home all day long is not what we want.

author: sevenA
text: Contrary to the popular opinion, I loved #LoveAajKal. Everyone won't enjoy it as it is a highly complex and internalized love story. @RandeepHooda is pleasantly amazing in the film and so are @TheAaryanKartik, #ArushiSharma & #Sara. #ImtiazAli is a true artist. Music is surreal..

author: sevenA
text: Just watched #Afsos. Oh man! This show is such a joy to watch. The world, the quirky characters, the humour, the darkness, the depth, Fokatiya, Upadhyay..... @PrimeVideoIN you guys are the best at making original Indian content. Period. @adg_5 @gulshandevaiah @anubhuti_k
